description:
The dangerous waters around the Whole Cake Island harbor terrifying creatures that pose a challenge for the Straw Hats! Meanwhile, Mama slips into a bout of her sickness and ravages her own land in search a specific pastry!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Massive Attack! Mom`s Hunger Pangs!
Dai Shingeki! Kui Wazurai no Mom
Une attaque massive! La crise de faim de Mamma !
大進撃! 食いわずらいのマム
